title: Drew Brees, NBA, MLB
itunes:title: Drew Brees, NBA, MLB
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb discusses the Drew Brees backlash, why he feels the NBA is facing an uphill battle, and what the MLB players must realize. Guests include Chris Broussard, and Jim Jackson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
